name: Evodevo II
description:
It is the 24th century, and the latest fad in spaceflight is user modification. Why fly a professionally made spaceship when you can hack one together with a welding torch and some duct tape? In Evodevo II, there are no service stations and there is no roadside assistance. You must overcome the perils of space using naught but your wit and the leftover parts conveniently floating in the vacuum.

Evodevo II was made for GMTK Game Jam 2021.
The source code can be found here.
